title: CRYSTAL TOMATO DIETARY SUPPLEMENT
cleaned_text: SKIN CARE CRYSTAL TOMATO DIETARY SUPPLEMENT - $169.00 Crystal Tomato dietary supplement is one of the first food supplements in the world to offer benefits for the skin from a unique breed of non-genetically modified white tomatoes. Containing Crystal Tomato Carotenoids which have been scientifically proven to be beneficial for skin health, the supplement is not only a safe and convenient way to beautiful, healthier skin and a more radiant complexion, but has also become a must-have for maintaining and protecting skin quality. - Decrease in skin dryness - Decrease in skin roughness - Increase in skin suppleness - Improvement in skin tone - Improvement in skin texture It can be taken anytime of the day, before or after food. It is recommended to take daily at a regular time. Quantity Share
